title: Pasta E Ceci (pasta With Chickpeas)
summary: Pastan E Ceci (pasta With Chickpeas) might be just the main course you are searching for. This vegan recipe serves 4 and costs $1.41 per serving. One portion of this dish contains approximately 15g of protein, 19g of fat, and a total of 454 calories. This recipe is liked by 6 foodies and cooks. A mixture of chickpeas, celery, pepper flakes, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty. To use up the olive oil you could follow this main course with the Sauteed Banana, Granolan and Yogurt Parfait as a dessert. With a spoonacular score of 81%, this dish is super. Similar recipes are Pastan e Ceci (Pasta with Chickpeas), Pastan e ceci (Pastan and Chickpeas), and Pastan e Ceci (Pasta with Chickpeas).

winePairing.pairingText: No one wine will suit every pasta dish. Pasta in a tomato-based sauce will usually work well with a medium-bodied red, such as a montepulciano or chianti. Pasta with seafood or pesto will fare better with a light-bodied white, such as a pinot grigio. Cheese-heavy pasta can pair well with red or white - you might try a sangiovese wine for hard cheeses and a chardonnay for soft cheeses. We may be able to make a better recommendation if you ask again with a specific pasta dish.
